```r
library(shiny)
library(rsurveyjs)

schema <- list(
  title="Quick survey",
  pages=list(list(elements=list(
    list(type="text", name="title", title="Idea title", isRequired=TRUE),
    list(type="comment", name="problem", title="Problem statement", isRequired=TRUE)
))))
ui <- fluidPage(surveyjsOutput("s"), verbatimTextOutput("final"))
server <- function(input, output, session){
  output$s <- renderSurveyjs(surveyjs(schema, live = TRUE))
  output$final <- renderPrint(req(input$s_data))
}
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
